comments.body: interesting, i would have expected this to belong to the selection controls delegate. This works too.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +250,254 @@        onChanged: widget.onChanged,
        onSubmitted: widget.onSubmitted,
        onSelectionChanged: (TextSelection _, bool longPress) => _onSelectionChanged(context, longPress),
        inputFormatters: widget.inputFormatters,
      ),
